subject: Re: [junit] JUnit Behaving Strangely in Eclipse
msgSnippet: John, How are you launching the test from within eclipse? Are you calling the Run menu item or the Run As...JUnit Test menu item? Hitting the Run menu item
messageBody:
John,

How are you launching the test from within eclipse?
Are you calling the Run menu item or the Run
As...JUnit Test menu item?

Hitting the Run menu item will launch your class
through the main() method, like any normal Java app.
Hitting the Run As...JUnit Test will run the tests
through a TestRunner which will execute each of your
testXXX() methods.

Hope that helps,

Jim
